title: The Week calls Tulsi Gabbard’s ‘outrageous tweet storm’ to Hillary Clinton ‘unhinged’
text:
We just checked our archives for the post about Tulsi Gabbard’s Twitter response to Hillary Clinton suggesting she’s just a Russian asset being set up for a third-party run on behalf of Vladimir Putin, and Twitchy called it “AMAZING” (all-caps included).

The Week, on the other hand, is calling it “unhinged.”

Tulsi Gabbard has an unhinged response for Hillary Clinton's Russian allegations.https://t.co/IrDpbV3MtD — The Week (@TheWeek) October 18, 2019

The shadow president and de facto head of the Democratic Party had just alleged that Gabbard was a Russian asset and that Russia had “a bunch of sites and bots and other ways of supporting her so far” for a third-party run. Remember: If you’re a Democrat who reads something online that disagrees with your point of view, a Russian bot posted it.

Just as a refresher, Gabbard took to Twitter and thanked Clinton, “the queen of warmongers, embodiment of corruption, and personification of the rot that has sickened the Democratic Party for so long” for finally coming out from behind the curtain as the one trying to destroy Gabbard’s reputation.

But yeah, Hillary’s not the one who’s unhinged.

Defending yourself against Hillary’s false allegations is now considered ‘unhinged’ to the MSM They don’t even try to hide it https://t.co/OTXiT91MzI — John Cardillo (@johncardillo) October 19, 2019

"Unhinged"? 🙄 Hardly. — Ronni G (@ronni_g) October 19, 2019

"Unhinged"? @TulsiGabbard was SPOT ON! — Tea Party Barbie (@laurahollis61) October 19, 2019

So, being called a Russian asset shouldn't piss her off. — Joe Mercer (@smokinjoe101) October 19, 2019

I’m here for the ratio. Make sure to tip your waiters. — imCarlBrown (@imCarlBrown) October 19, 2019

Hillary writes for @TheWeek now. — Scotty Potty (@HTX_Con) October 19, 2019

I can show you unhinged, and it's definitely on the left but it's not @TulsiGabbard. — While Supplies Last (@corrcomm) October 19, 2019

I think you mean BEST response? — 🦇🎃KHAOS ANIMA ~ Goddess of the Void 🎃🦇 (@DSartworks418) October 18, 2019

This article proves Tulsi is correct — Teeder Bialy (@MetallicallyHip) October 18, 2019

Therein lies the problem. Liberal media and establishment thinks they can say whatever they want and the targets are just supposed to sit back and take it. — Jason Scalese (@coachscalese) October 19, 2019

that's why they hate Trump. He's a Republican that fights back, which has never happened before! — Ellen (@elliemaygottasa) October 19, 2019

Unhinged?

Try honest. — ZEC Prophet (@ZecProphet) October 18, 2019

Delete your magazine. — The Red-Headed Russian Asset (@TRHLofficial) October 19, 2019

Man, the media really can spin anything can't they. — Shalee: Repping Aussie's For Yang 🧢 (@AussiesForYang) October 19, 2019

I'll never understand the lefts desire to continue defending HRC. — Alt-Center Adjacent (@JustGreggo) October 18, 2019

Its mindblowing — JD (@FreeChurro666) October 19, 2019

Somebody’s got to fill up time on all those lefty podcasts.

It was the best tweet EVER, and hopefully we can now see The Queen of Warmongers has no clothes. — Roderick Burrell (@roderickburrell) October 18, 2019

No! I want her clothes to stay on! pic.twitter.com/umxlhk3Z3e — 👻The_Kat™👻 (@The_Kat_Roars) October 19, 2019

Reason #928 why I no longer subscribe to The Week. — DC (@whatzcooken) October 18, 2019

A strong, capable, and good woman who doesn't back down when an old witch tries to defame her and y'all call her "unhinged". I think @TulsiGabbard should sue anyone who perpetuates this Russian Asset story. Unless they have proof this appears to be a good defamation case. — Wandering Mind (@PonderingMindz) October 19, 2019

Correction: Awesome response to Hillary's unhinged allegations. — Ben (@freedomanddogs) October 19, 2019

Unhinged? Show me the lie. — Dr. Franklinstein 🎃 (@FranklinH3000) October 18, 2019

Here for the ratio, which you richly deserve. — Matt McConnell (@compatidude) October 18, 2019

Already the ratio has begun. — Phil, but spooky (@philthatremains) October 18, 2019

Unhinged? No. Just someone who has the guts to say what everyone else is afraid to say. — Bonnie Blue (@BonnieBlueTK) October 19, 2019

They really are afraid of her, aren’t they?

The low bar of woke journalism — David (@paradise919400) October 19, 2019

@TulsiGabbard has an awesome response for @HillaryClinton’s russian allegations. There, fixed it for you. — JimBoDean (@JimBoDean1967) October 19, 2019

Yeah. She was the unhinged one. OK. — Leon Storie (@lstorie1971) October 18, 2019

Are you people drunk? — Tony Bruno (@TonyBrunoShow) October 18, 2019

The Week has an unhinged response to Tulsi Gabbard — Doctor Benway (@DrBenway1959) October 19, 2019

When the truth is finally told, it seems unhinged. It was glorious! #QueenOfWarmongers — Grace (@GraceStrength) October 18, 2019

Decorated army major smeared without evidence by The Weak — definitely not spooky man. (@clarkeffinkent) October 19, 2019

This is a pathetic headline — ☩ Violet Irwin ☩ (@VioletIrwin76) October 19, 2019

couldn't imagine someone running for presidency not "taking the gloves off" when the FORMER Sec of State, along with a lot MSM, tries to convince the American Public that they are a russian asset/agent — chazing sats (@_Chris_Hayes_) October 18, 2019

Tulsi Gabbard says what party insiders were too gutless to say. #Tulsi2020 #CorruptClinton — Critical Tea (@TamaraRoark) October 19, 2019

I hope she sees this. — phreeck (@phreeck) October 19, 2019

That’s not unhinged. That was freaking brilliant. — Kimberly Phillips (@LibertarianKim) October 19, 2019

Surfer lady good — Daniel Preus🧢 (@DanielPreus) October 18, 2019

Or, how about, "Tulsi has a response exactly in line with the preposterous baseless allegations smearing her" As a service I'm available to help you with your poorly thought out headlines. — Al Washburn (@mkealz) October 19, 2019

MUST. PROTECT. QUEEN…. — From the Land of Sky Blue Waters 🇺🇸 (@HammsLager) October 19, 2019

I think we found the Russians. — Equality 7-2521 (@Zer0space1) October 19, 2019

Funny – sounded completely hinged to me. Accurate as hell, also. — Lars Kerch (@Laughing_Lars) October 19, 2019

Hillary's crazy assertions about "Russian assets": Fine Defending oneself from crazy assertions: Unhinged Exhibit #8,657 why nobody trusts the media. — Milo Stone (@GooberGabbing) October 19, 2019

Learn to code — Jeremiah (@Crackorback) October 18, 2019

Here’s a bonus funny from The Babylon Bee (soon to be fact-checked by Snopes):

Hillary Clinton Asked To Leave Costco After Repeatedly Accusing Sample Lady Of Being A Russian Assethttps://t.co/G6UAE7bhSW — The Babylon Bee (@TheBabylonBee) October 18, 2019

… and some class from Andrew Yang:

Tulsi Gabbard deserves much more respect and thanks than this. She literally just got back from serving our country abroad. — Andrew Yang🧢 (@AndrewYang) October 19, 2019

Related:
description: The Week rushed in to defend Queen Hillary against an "outrageous tweet storm" she absolutely deserved.
